name: Steve Hillin

roles.title: Director of Engineering
highlights: Lead and guide a team of frontend, backend, and full-stack software developers to meet deadlines and requirements of a cybersecurity-focused training B2B SaaS platform.
Manage code review process and Jira workflows.
Optimize SQL queries and prioritize legacy bug fixes where workarounds became the norm.
Work with Product to optimize new initiatives and align with technical realities within the platform.
Facilitate needs related to achieving SOC 2 compliance.

roles.title: Senior Python Developer
highlights: Using Python Flask, maintain and extend backend REST APIs in a decoupled web application, ensuring timely responses, async tasks, and optimized SQL queries to MySQL RDS.
Implement various repos for different business needs, including reporting analytics and application-focused feature delivery.

roles.title: Security & Automation Engineer
highlights: Use Python to automate multiple tasks, from billing automations (via vendor APIs) to internal tooling for a Managed Service Provider.
Build custom reporting by capturing point-in-time data not exposed by Connectwise Manage to help with revenue projection and trend analysis.

Built integrated support AI that ingested customer requests, retrieved user-scoped information, then prompted ChatGPT to suggest remediation steps. Info automatically added as an internal note so support agents could only see. Included cost data for value evaluation.

roles.title: Senior VoIP Engineer
highlights: Support and maintain various Class 4 and Class 5 telecommunications platforms for regional fiber ISP.
Build various automations around operations, billing, and LCR.
Upskill support agents on supporting VoIP customers.

roles.title: Senior VoIP Engineer / Lead Developer
highlights: Support and maintain 180+ FreePBX isolated instances and SIP routing for various customer sizes, from SMB to call centers.
Build various automations and integrations, such as PCI-compliant call recording triggers, billing, and call center automation & reporting.
Built TTS automations for individual customers to automate information gathering / feedback with on-the-fly audio generation and caching.

roles.title: Network / Systems Administrator
highlights: LAMP e-commerce platform management, including outbound email campaigns and custom CDN.
Thin-client management for cost optimizations, using PXE with custom BASH node monitoring and centralized app deployments / upgrades.
Plan and implement move from on-prem to colo, implementing MPLS between various physical stores and implementing redundant DCs and separating application server from AD.

roles.title: Systems Administrator
highlights: Manage various aspects of physical security startup, including Asterisk, DNS, MySQL, microservices, and alarm panel testing procedures.
Handle customer support and onboarding.
Build testing protocols and fixtures for custom PCB embedded systems.

contracting.description: Assist a B2B / B2C education business with understanding their business model, known constraints, and what changes actually move the needle. After building a reporting dashboard, began targeted PPC that saw double-digit increase in overall sales with the largest month on record happening 90 days after initiation.

Engineer a responsive, mobile-first web middleware application framework to marry a mapping software to a CRM with Redis for blazing-fast data queries, GPS functions, and enhanced communications for a fiber optic organization. The primary KPI (Mean Time to Repair) for fiber outages was reduced by more than 80%.

Design and implement global PBX services for an international physical security company, including hosting selection, routing, and number management. Train in-house staff on management and support operations.

Build and manage custom CRM solutions to minimize human error and maximize profits for a particular client type, including billing management, reporting, and automation. This removed approximately 80 hours of manual processes, allowing the company to focus their efforts on customer service and sales.
Re-engineer hosting environment for large online classified ads website that was acquired by Hearst Enterprises.
